function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate filtration techniques for removing pathogens like SARS-CoV-2 from shared air environments.","Impact":"Increased transmission potential of contagious diseases such as SARS-CoV-2 due to gaps in filter edges.","Mitigation":"Regular inspection and maintenance of filtration systems to ensure proper sealing and functioning.","Technologies":"High-efficiency filtration technologies like MERV-13 or higher filters and HEPA filters.","People":"Building occupants and healthcare staff in hospitals with filtering systems.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and healthcare facility management."},{"Description":"Impact of the sharing economy on infectious disease transmission in shared spaces such as coworking environments, homes, and transportation.","Impact":"Increased potential for environmentally mediated pathways of exposure and complexity in enacting social-distancing measures.","Mitigation":"Implementing stringent cleaning protocols, promoting social distancing, and enhancing ventilation in shared spaces.","Technologies":"Enhanced ventilation systems, stringent cleaning technologies, and collaboration platforms for shared space management.","People":"Users of shared workspaces, occupants of shared homes, and users of shared transportation services.","Owner":"Operators of shared workspaces, property managers, and transportation companies."}]}
